project.title: Project Name
project.description: A name used to identify your project on the dashboard.

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Endpoints are essential for the SDKs to access and interact with features.

project-key.title: Project Key
project-key.description: Here is your project key, which you can use to integrate and access the features in your project.

form-key.title: Form ID
form-key.description: Here is your form ID, which you can use to integrate and access the features in your websites.

keys.title: API Keys
keys.description: API keys are used with the SDKs, such as JavaScript, React, etc.

form.title: Delete Form
form.description: Deleting the form will permanently remove all its submissions.
form.placeholder: Warning: This action is irreversible. Proceed with caution.

modal.title: Are you sure about this action?
modal.description: Warning: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the {{name}} form.

project.title: Delete Project
project.description: Deleting the project will permanently remove all its environments and feature flags.
project.placeholder: Warning: This action is irreversible. Proceed with caution.

modal.title: Are you sure about this action?
modal.description: Warning: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the {{name}} project, including flags, history, and all collaborator associations.

form.title: Form Name
form.description: A name used to identify your form on the dashboard.

enable-form.title: Enable Form
enable-form.description: Activate/Deactivate the form to control submission collection.

data-retention.title: Data Retention
data-retention.description: Store incoming submissions in the Basestack Forms database.

webhook-url.title: Webhook URL
webhook-url.description: Each time a new form submission is received, JSON data will be sent to the specified URL.

emails.title: Emails
emails.description: Send submission notifications to these email addresses.
emails.text: Press Enter to add an email in the input field.

spam-protection.title: Spam AI âœ¨
spam-protection.description: Our AI detects and filters out spam submissions. Data Retention needs to be enabled for the AI to work.

ip-block-rules.title: IP Block Rules
ip-block-rules.description: List IP addresses to block; Basestack Forms will reject messages from those addresses.
ip-block-rules.text: Press Enter to add an IP address in the input field.

honeypot.title: Honeypot
honeypot.description: If this field is present in the submission data, it will be ignored, and an error will be returned.
honeypot.text: A Honeypot field is a hidden field that is added to a form to catch bots without the user knowing.

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: Add websites to restrict form submissions to only those originating from the specified URLs.
websites.text: Press Enter to add a website in the input field. Example: https://www.example.com

success-url.title: Custom Success URL
success-url.description: After a successful form submission, users will be directed to your custom URL.

failed-url.title: Custom Failed URL
failed-url.description: After a failed form submission, users will be directed to your custom URL.

redirect-url.title: Custom Redirect URL
redirect-url.description: After submitting the form, users will be provided with the option to return to the specified URL.

data-query-string.title: Form Data as Query String
data-query-string.description: Pass submission data through query parameters. The return URL will be dynamically populated with the submitted form data.

invite.title: Team Members
invite.description: Add members of your organization to manage this project. Developers can also be invited to access API keys for code integration.
invite.placeholder: Note: Users must already have an account to appear in the list (Email Invites Coming Soon).

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: {{type}} environments for this project. Environments allow you to control how your feature flags behave in different settings or stages of development.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {{name}} environment, flags, history and remove all collaborator associations.
